column1: Warning! Webmin has detected that the program http://localhost:10000/mysql/csv.cgi/main.csv was linked to from an unknown URL
column2: which appears to be outside the Webmin server. This may be an attempt to trick your server into executing a dangerous command.

column1: If your browser does not send the <tt>Referer</tt> header needed
column2:
you can turn off this check as follows :
  • Login to Webmin normally.
  • Go to the Webmin Configuration module.
  • Click on the Trusted Referrers icon.
  • Check the Trust links from unknown referrers box
column3: and click Save.

column2: you can configure Webmin to allow links from unknown referers by :<ul><li>Login as <tt>root</tt>
column3:
and edit the /etc/webmin/config file.
  • Find the line referers_none=1 and change it to referers_none=0.
  • Save the file.
